description: A composite allowing to use a pull-to-refresh gesture to trigger and visualize a long running operation.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

refreshEnabled.description: Whether the pull-to-refresh gesture can be performed by the user. When disabled, the `RefreshComposite` behaves like a regular `Composite`.

refreshIndicator.description: Whether to visualize a long running operation. After the user has triggered a manual refresh, this property is `true` and should be set to `false` when the operation ended.

refreshMessage.description: A message to show to the user during the refresh operation.

refresh.description: Fired when a refresh is triggered by the user.
